scripts.generate: mkdir -p archived-resumes/$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S) && cp resume.md archived-resumes/$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S)/ && cp output/* archived-resumes/$(date +%Y-%m-%d_%H-%M-%S)/ 2>/dev/null || true && npm run all
scripts.all: npm run html && npm run pdf && npm run word
scripts.html: pandoc resume.md -f markdown -t html -c resume-stylesheet.css -s -o output/jason-toups-resume.html
scripts.pdf: pandoc resume.md -f markdown -t pdf --pdf-engine=wkhtmltopdf -c resume-stylesheet.css -s -o output/jason-toups-resume.pdf
scripts.word: pandoc resume.md -f markdown -t docx --pdf-engine=wkhtmltopdf -c resume-stylesheet.css -s -o output/jason-toups-resume.docx
